TopicTitle: A Resource for Hard Science-Fiction/Near Future Mods

Articles.Content:
http://www.projectrho.com/public_html/rocket/

Atomic Rocket is really the go-to resource for science fiction and near future developments, it's comprehensive, detailed and explains all the little details a rocket scientist might want (or at least sets you on the path to being able to find those details out.) Further, it's comprehensible to people without degrees in Advanced Hypermath.

Even if you're not a modder, give it a read. Particularly the part about the Orion Drive. Using nuclear shaped charges as a means of propulsion is the best thing ever, and I'm sad the KSP Orion Drive mod isn't under development anymore.
Nyrath is a member here. He made the Orion mod.
